presets.name: Catppuccin Mocha
presets.description: Smooth pastel dark theme with excellent contrast.
presets.config:
# Catppuccin Mocha

theme = catppuccin-mocha
font-family = "JetBrains Mono"
font-size = 14
background-opacity = 0.96
window-padding-x = 8
window-padding-y = 8
cursor-style = block

presets.name: Gruvbox Dark Hard
presets.description: Warm high-contrast theme for focused coding.
presets.config:
theme = GruvboxDarkHard
font-family = "Iosevka"
font-size = 13
minimum-contrast = 2
bold-is-bright = true

presets.name: Nord
presets.description: Cool, icy colors with balanced contrast.
presets.config:
theme = Nord
font-family = "JetBrains Mono NL"
font-size = 14
background-opacity = 0.97

presets.name: Squirrelsong Dark
presets.description: Low contrast theme designed for long sessions.

presets.name: Minimal macOS
presets.description: Clean macOS-like terminal with subtle blur.
presets.config:
font-family = "SF Mono"
font-size = 13
background-opacity = 0.92
background-blur-radius = 20
macos-titlebar-style = tabs
